languages.text: {n}Дознаватель умолкает, явно недовольный своей необычно неровной речью.{/n} "Надеюсь, мой ответ не задел вас. Теперь, если позволите... давайте вернемся к более безопасным темам".
{n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель умолкает, явно недовольный своей необычно неровной речью.{/n} "Надеюсь, мой ответ не задел вас. Теперь, если позволите... давайте вернемся к более безопасным темам".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El interrogador guarda silencio, visiblemente molesto con tan inusual pomposidad.{/n} «Espero que mi respuesta no le haya perturbado. Y ahora, con su permiso... volvamos a temas más inocuos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador guarda silencio, visiblemente molesto con tan inusual pomposidad.{/n} «Espero que mi respuesta no le haya perturbado. Y ahora, con su permiso... volvamos a temas más inocuos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは黙り、珍しくたどたどしい話し方に苛立ちを見せていた。{/n}「今の返答であなたを傷つけなかったことを願う。では、あなたの許可が得られるなら…より無難な話題に戻そう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは黙り、珍しくたどたどしい話し方に苛立ちを見せていた。{/n}「今の返答であなたを傷つけなかったことを願う。では、あなたの許可が得られるなら…より無難な話題に戻そう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默下来。很显然，他结结巴巴的话语让他自己感到不快。{/n}“我希望我的答复没有伤害到你。如果你允许的话……还是回到更安全的话题上来吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默下来。很显然，他结结巴巴的话语让他自己感到不快。{/n}“我希望我的答复没有伤害到你。如果你允许的话……还是回到更安全的话题上来吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur s'interrompt, manifestement irrité par son discours empreint d'une affectation inhabituelle.{/n} « J'espère que ma réponse ne vous a pas {mf|blessé|blessée}. À présent, avec votre permission... je vous propose de revenir à des sujets plus consensuels. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur s'interrompt, manifestement irrité par son discours empreint d'une affectation inhabituelle.{/n} « J'espère que ma réponse ne vous a pas {mf|blessé|blessée}. À présent, avec votre permission... je vous propose de revenir à des sujets plus consensuels. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator verstummt, offenkundig irritiert von seiner ungewöhnlich gestelzten Ausdruckweise.{/n} "Ich hoffe, meine Antwort hat Euch nicht verletzt. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis ... widmen wir uns nun wieder weniger verfänglichen Themen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator verstummt, offenkundig irritiert von seiner ungewöhnlich gestelzten Ausdruckweise.{/n} "Ich hoffe, meine Antwort hat Euch nicht verletzt. Mit Eurer Erlaubnis ... widmen wir uns nun wieder weniger verfänglichen Themen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu susuyor. Konuşmasının yapmacıklığından rahatsız olduğu çok belli.{/n} "Umarım cevabım seni incitmemiştir. Şimdi müsaadenle daha güzel konulara dönebiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator falls silent, clearly irked by his unusually stilted speech.{/n} "I hope my answer has not hurt you. Now, with your permission... we will return to safer topics."
